results.card: If I resist Satan, he will flee from me
In repentance I draw closer to God and he draws closer to me
Prayer works
God's protection until I receive my eternal inheritance
My enduring faith will bring me praise, honor, and glory at the second coming
God is watching over me and listening to my prayers
God gives favor to the humble and lifts them up in his time.
God cares about me and all my worries
God gave me everything I need to live a godly life
God's promises enable me to share his divine nature and escape the world's corruption
There will be a new heaven and new earth where there is only righteousness
Those who believe enter God's eternal rest from works
Jesus saves me completely because he will always intercede for me
Jesus will return to save those who are waiting for him.
Jesus's sacrifice means I am counted perfect and the Holy Spriit works on perfecting me
God uses hardship to lovingly discipline me so I can become holy
Learning from God's discipline brings righteousness and peace.
God will never leave me or forsake me
Jesus never changes
When I confess my sins, I am forgiven
Whoever does God's will has eternal life
The Spirit within me is more powerful than Satan
I can know I have eternal life
God grants every request that conforms to his will
God will keep me from falling and I will be without fault in his presence
